      public static String createEmptyKey(software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.S3Client s3, String bucketName, String key, String manifestMsg)
      Creates the empty key
      Parameters:
      s3 - a given instantiated S3Client
      bucketName - Bucket name to which the PUT operation was initiated
      key - Object key for which the PUT operation was initiated
      manifestMsg - String to send to the service
      Returns:
      returns the created empty key

    • listObjectsInBucket

      public static List<String> listObjectsInBucket(com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 s3, String bucketName, String prefix) throws software.amazon.awssdk.core.exception.SdkClientException, IOException
      List keys in bucket based on prefix
      Parameters:
      s3 - the V1 S3 client to use
      bucketName - the bucket name
      prefix - the bucket prefix
      Returns:
      the keys contained in the bucket
      Throws:
      software.amazon.awssdk.core.exception.SdkClientException - if any error occurred in the communication with the S3 backend storage
      IOException

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      s3 - the S3 client to use
      bucketName - the name of the new bucket
      region - the region, in which the bucket shall be stored
      Returns:
      the new bucket name or null, if the operation failed

      Create a base V2 S3 client
      Parameters:
      s3AccessKey - the access key for the client
      secretAccessKey - the secret access key for the client
      s3Endpoint - the S3 endpoint to connect to
      region - the region, on which the client shall operate
      Returns:
      a configured S3 client or null, if an error occurred

    • v2FetchFile

      public static Boolean v2FetchFile(software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.S3Client s3, String s3Object, String containerPath)
      Fetch file from S3 to local file
      Parameters:
      s3 - a given instantiated S3Client
      s3Object - URI of S3-Object (e.g. s3://bucket/path/to/some/file)
      containerPath - local target filePath
      Returns:
      true, if the operation succeeded, false otherwise

    • v1FetchFile

      public static Boolean v1FetchFile(com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 s3Client, String s3Bucket, String s3Key, File targetFile)
      Fetch file from S3 to local file using AWS S3 SDK V1 TransferManager
      Parameters:
      s3Client - a given instantiated V1 S3 client
      s3Bucket - S3 bucket name
      s3Key - S3 object key (without bucket)
      targetFile - local (POSIX) target file path
      Returns:
      true, if the operation succeeded, false otherwise

      Fetch file from S3 as input stream
      Parameters:
      s3 - a given instantiated S3Client
      s3Object - URI of S3-Object (e.g. s3://bucket/path/to/some/file)
      Returns:
      the file content

    • v1UploadDir

      public static ArrayList<String> v1UploadDir(com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 v1S3Client, String sourceDirPath, String targetBucketName, String targetKeyPrefix, boolean recursive, boolean pause) throws com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException, InterruptedException
      Upload a directory to S3 using multipart uploads
      Parameters:
      v1S3Client - the S3 V1 client to use
      sourceDirPath - path to the directory to upload
      targetBucketName - the name of the target bucket
      targetKeyPrefix - the key prefix to set for the target bucket
      recursive - true, if subdirectories shall be copied, too, false otherwise
      pause - (not used)
      Returns:
      a list of uploaded keys or null, if the operation failed
      Throws:
      com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException - if an error occurred during communication with the S3 backend storage
      InterruptedException - if the wait for the upload completion was interrupted

    • v1UploadFile

      public static ArrayList<String> v1UploadFile(com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 v1S3Client, String sourceFilePath, String targetBucketName, String targetKeyPrefix, boolean pause) throws Exception
      Upload file to S3 using multipart uploads The source file is uploaded to a S3 storage. The target key in the storage is build as: s3://<bucket name>/<target key prefix>/<source file name>
      Parameters:
      v1S3Client - the S3 V1 client to use
      sourceFilePath - The path of source file
      targetBucketName - The S3 bucket to store the file
      targetKeyPrefix - The key in the bucket to store the file
      pause - (not used)
      Returns:
      a single-element list of keys uploaded or null, if the operation failed
      Throws:
      com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException - if an error occurred during communication with the S3 backend storage
      InterruptedException - if the wait for the upload completion was interrupted
      Exception

    • v1Upload

      public static ArrayList<String> v1Upload(com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 v1S3Client, String sourcePath, String targetBucketName, String targetPathPrefix, boolean pause) throws com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException, InterruptedException, Exception
      Upload files or directories to S3 using Multipart-Uploads
      Parameters:
      v1S3Client - the S3 V1 client to use
      sourcePath - path to the file or directory to upload
      targetBucketName - the name of the target bucket
      targetPathPrefix - the key prefix to set for the target bucket
      pause - (not used)
      Returns:
      a list of uploaded keys or null, if the operation failed
      Throws:
      com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException - if an error occurred during communication with the S3 backend storage
      InterruptedException - if the wait for the upload completion was interrupted
      Exception - on an unspecific error condition during a file upload

    • v1Copy

      public static ArrayList<String> v1Copy(com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 s3Client, String sourceBucketName, String sourceObjectKeyPrefix, String destBucketName, String destObjectPrefix) throws com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException, InterruptedException
      Copy objects between S3 buckets or inside S3 buckets
      Parameters:
      s3Client - the S3 V1 client to use
      sourceBucketName - the bucket to copy from
      sourceObjectKeyPrefix - the object key to copy from
      destBucketName - the bucket to copy to
      destObjectPrefix - the object key to copy to
      Returns:
      a list of copied keys or null, if the operation failed
      Throws:
      com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException - if an error occurred during communication with the S3 backend storage
      InterruptedException - if the wait for the upload completion was interrupted

    • createFolder

      public static void createFolder(software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.S3Client client, String bucketName, String folderName) throws software.amazon.awssdk.core.exception.SdkException, software.amazon.awssdk.core.exception.SdkClientException, software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.model.S3Exception, software.amazon.awssdk.awscore.exception.AwsServiceException
      Create a folder-like object in repository. This method passes low-level S3 exceptions on.
      Parameters:
      client - the S3 V2 client to use
      bucketName - the name of the bucket to create the folder in
      folderName - the name of the folder to create
      Throws:
      software.amazon.awssdk.core.exception.SdkException - Base class for all exceptions that can be thrown by the SDK (both service and client). Can be used for catch all scenarios.
      software.amazon.awssdk.core.exception.SdkClientException - If any client side error occurs such as an IO related failure, failure to get credentials, etc.
      software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.model.S3Exception - Base class for all service exceptions. Unknown exceptions will be thrown as an instance of this type.
      software.amazon.awssdk.awscore.exception.AwsServiceException - if an error in the S3 object storage service occurs

    • deleteDirectory

      public static void deleteDirectory(com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 client, String bucketName, String prefix)
      Delete object(s) in repository. The prefix is either an object key or like a directory path
      Parameters:
      client - the S3 V1 client to use
      bucketName - the name of the bucket to delete the object(s) in
      prefix - the object prefix

    • getLength

      public static long getLength(com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 client, String bucketName, String key)
      Get the object length (file size)
      Parameters:
      client - the S3 V1 client to use
      bucketName - the name of the bucket, in which the object is stored
      key - the object key
      Returns:
      the length of the object or zero, if no object metadata could be retrieved
